content: CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 20 Jun 2019I'm self-employed. Do I still need to make compulsory Medisave contribution when I already meet the Medisave limit?If reach limit already, even if I make contributions, where would the money go?1 answerAnswerBump0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 23 Jun 2019Yes you do, the excess will go over to your Special Account.0 comments2
